review.comment: Highly recommended. Great service at a fair price. Chris was professional and did a great job.
review.review_reply: Thank you for choosing Remedy for your plumbing needs! Chris is definitely a great asset to our family!  We appreciate you!!!

review.comment: The plumber came out for a fair price to evaluate the problem. When they assessed that I needed a new disposal they did not charge me that visit as an extra fee. Got a guy out the same day and gave me tiered pricing options. Highly recommend.
review.review_reply:
Russ,
Thank you for your positive review of Remedy! We appreciate your business and look forward to meeting your plumbing needs in the future!

review.comment: Remedy Plumbing is the best. We hired a different company to install a brand new toilet. The other plumber did an awful job. A week after it was installed, it quit working.  My wife called Remedy and they came out the same day. The guys were very knowledgeable and fixed my problem right then! I highly recommend this company, and will definitely use them in the future!  Watch out for those other company’s just looking to make a buck!
review.review_reply:
Boone,
We are sorry to hear about your experience with other companies. We are glad that you found Remedy, and appreciate your business!

review.comment: I rarely write reviews but my experience starting with Jaimie who scheduled the appointment and Blake who diagnosed a difficult problem for an unusual leak that we found. iIt was overall such a great experience.  Blake was extremely polite, respectful and worked for several hours to figure out the source of the leak and repair it quickly. I would definitely recommend using this company for your future plumbing needs.
review.review_reply:
Suzanne,
Thank you for your positive review of Remedy! We appreciate your business and look forward to meeting your plumbing needs in the future!

review.comment: These guys really saved me when some upgrades and a small leak repair unearthed a serious slab leak! Jamey is very kind and went above & beyond to help find a solution. Chris is super personable, and he and Blake worked so hard to get my full re-plumb completed quickly and thoroughly. I’m so grateful for all their help!!
review.review_reply: Thank you for your review Lindsay! We appreciate the opportunity to meet your plumbing needs!  We strive to be a great team from the first phone call, to the completion of the job!

review.comment: Remedy was great!  They answered the phone and came out the same day, which is not common today when you are trying to find a plumber.  They provided friendly, profession, and straightforward service.  Remedy got us hooked up to county water and upgraded a few of our plumbing items as we transitioned from well to county water.

Had a leak in main water line outside. Chris explained everything in detail about what he was doing & was very polite & well mannered. Would highly recommend Remedy Plumbing & will definitely use them in the future if we have any problems.
review.review_reply: Thank you for your business Kimberly! We look forward to working with you again!

review.comment: Chris was on time, courtesy and kept us updated during the repair/install of a new hot water heater. I highly recommend him and the company.
review.review_reply: Thank you Cindy! We appreciate the positive feedback! Chris is definitely a great asset to our team here at Remedy!

review.comment: The Remedy Team was wonderful at communicating with us to install two water heaters, a mixer, an expander and a home water filtration system. From first contact to completion they answered our questions, gave a written estimate and were professional in knowledge and presentation. I highly recommend Remedy Plumbing. Blake was our contact and his representation of Remedy was phenomenal. Thanks, Blake.
review.review_reply: Thank you Lisa! We really appreciate the opportunity to service your plumbing needs! Blake is definitely a great asset to our company!

review.comment: I cannot begin to say enough good things!! I had already posted a review the morning they came out because they did so great, but I had to come edit the comment because they absolutely went over and beyond! The morning I was having issues, they came out that morning and helped to resolve the issue. They were so professional and kind. After this, there was an issue with the payment. They were so understanding through the entire process of getting that fixed. Being a college student, sometimes it can be hard to find a company that you truly trust, but I can positively say they are the best.
review.review_reply:
Sara,
Thank you for your kind words! We are happy that your issues were resolved in a timely manner! Thank you again for your business!

review.comment: Great service from Remedy Plumbing! We lost hot water recently. Remedy sent someone here immediately, a young man by the name of Blake. Blake did such a great job-professional, thorough, neat, knowledgeable -we expanded the work to replacing both old hot water tanks and installing a new dishwasher. You won’t be sorry if you call Remedy. Ask for Blake. We intend to for all future plumbing needs.
review.review_reply:
Kathleen,
Thank you for your awesome review of our company! We appreciate your business! Thank you for recommending Blake as well!

review.comment: I would recommend Remedy to everyone. Good price and on time and good work Thank you Chris

I had a sewer line replaced with a different company that was dishonest resulting in me wasting a lot of time and money to rectify the problem. I googled local plumbers and was instantly sold after speaking with the owner of Remedy Plumbing, I had great confidence that they would fix the issue in a timely matter and they did. Everyone was professional, I highly recommend. I will continue to use this company for all of my plumbing needs.
review.review_reply:
Shaleka,
Sorry to hear that you had such a bad experience with other plumbing companies. We appreciate the opportunity to service your plumbing needs!

review.comment: Good, quick, and reliable work at a good price!
Showed up on time. Did great work. Was amazing. Highly recommend.

Jamey at Remedy was incredible. He came out and fixed a leak in my washer line in less time that I expected! He had to cut out the old pipe, run new water lines and then patch up all the drywall. Did an amazing job and was very affordable too! I am going to be a repeat customer for sure.

Very professional guy with exceptionally quality craftsmanship. I called on him a Saturday panicking with a busted water line and not sure how I was even going to get to it, much less get it fixed before Monday. Jamey came out within a hour of the first phone call and had me fixed in no time and with a very reasonable price. I followed up about a week later with a larger job that him and his team handled with the upmost professionalism and did a first class job. Highly recommended to anyone needing a plumber, these guys rock!

Our sewage line blocked up at about 11pm, called Jamie the next morning and he was over before noon. We had another plumber come over even earlier and he quoted us a job that would cost up to $4,500. That plumber also misdiagnosed what the real issue was. When Jamie came over and expected the issue he assured me that my wife and I would not need to spend that much and that he could fix the problem for a reasonable cost... that's exactly what he did.

From start to finish he explained to me what he was doing and why he was doing it and as a first time home owner I thought this was incredibly helpful and kind. He also laid out for me multiple scenarios and encouraged me to do what was best for my wife and I. I hate it when people press the sales button and try to make people go all out when it isn't really necessary... Jamie was not that way at all.

100% recommend Jamie and Remedy Plumbing. Knowledgable, efficient, honest, and gets the job done.
